attributes.action: Put pressure on the Canadian Government in stopping the culling of baby seals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The annual seal hunt in Canada has just began - up to 325,000 pups could be killed in the coming months; battered to death in return for £8.3m.

We must put an end to this babaric harvesting of animals. If you care about them, join us in petitioning the Prime Minister to put pressure on the Canadian Government to stop this unethical trade and provide a solution for the long term survival of both seals and fishermen.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/SealHunting/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
